title: Chula Vista, California
headline: Wedding crasher
description: A series of all day meetings on the ISS meant he was running late to Harry and Dana's wedding. Decisive action was necessary, because if you know Dana, you know she's not the type who tolerates tardiness. Especially not on her wedding day.

fb.title: The Most Interesting Man in Chula Vista, California
fb.copy: A series of all day meetings on the ISS meant he was running late to Harry and Dana's wedding. Decisive action was necessary, because if you know Dana, you know she's not the type who tolerates tardiness. Especially not on her wedding day.

tw.copy: A series of all day meetings on the ISS meant he was running late to Harry and Dana's wedding.

title: Muskegon, Michigan
description: Due in large part to the unorthodox playbook he devised for Coach Kirk and the Gophers, the team was undefeated going into their final regular season game. Here, he thought it’d be apropos to pop by and draw up how they would celebrate their 17th consecutive division title.
headline: Coach

fb.title: The Most Interesting Man in Muskegon, Michigan
fb.copy: Due in large part to the unorthodox playbook he devised for Coach Kirk and the Gophers, the team was undefeated going into their final regular season game. Here, he thought it’d be apropos to pop by and draw up how they would celebrate their 17th consecutive division title.

tw.copy: Due to the unorthodox playbook he devised, the team was undefeated going into their final regular season game.

title: Montevideo, Uruguay
headline: Well
description: After a football escaped into a well during a heated match between locals outside Montevideo, he felt obligated to retrieve the ball so they could complete their game. Locals quickly subbed him in afterwards.

fb.title: The Most Interesting Man in Montevideo, Uruguay
fb.copy: After a football escaped into a well during a heated match between locals outside Montevideo, he felt obligated to retrieve the ball so they could complete their game. Locals quickly subbed him in afterwards.

tw.copy: A football escaped into a well during a heated match between locals outside Montevideo.

title: Nairobi, Kenya
description: To show his loyalty and support for a certain unnamed dignitary letting the cat out of the bag, he offered to tattoo himself with a majestic cat resembling one he befriended while on safari in Southeastern Kenya.
headline: Tattoo

fb.title: The Most Interesting Man in Nairobi, Kenya
fb.copy: To show his loyalty and support for a certain unnamed dignitary letting the cat out of the bag, he offered to tattoo himself with a majestic cat resembling one he befriended while on safari in Southeastern Kenya.

tw.copy: To show his loyalty and support for a certain unnamed dignitary, he offered to tattoo himself.

title: Tutuhan, Guam
description: While on holiday in Guam he developed a culinary karate program that quickly became a worldwide fitness phenomenon popular among celebrities and professional athletes.
headline: Coconut Smash

fb.title: The Most Interesting Man in Tutuhan, Guam
fb.copy: While on holiday in Guam he developed a culinary karate program that quickly became a worldwide fitness phenomenon popular among celebrities and professional athletes.

title: Znojmo, Czech Republic
description: Here he is in a knife-throwing competition. We’d give you more context, but he specifically asked that we not.
headline: Knife Throw

title: Vancouver, Canada
description: After he was overcome by an uncontrollable urge to swim during a water taxi ride in Vancouver, his phone was rendered waterlogged. So, naturally, he opted to build his own.
headline: Tech

fb.title: The Most Interesting Man in Vancouver, Canada
fb.copy: After he was overcome by an uncontrollable urge to swim during a water taxi ride in Vancouver, his phone was rendered waterlogged. So, naturally, he opted to build his own.

title: Saint Petersburg, Russia
description: His fortune cookies often include investment advice. In fact, while dining at a local hotspot in Saint Petersburg following an acrobatic zip-lining performance, he received a fortune cookie advising him to invest more time in drone videography.
headline: Fortune Cookie

tw.copy: He received a fortune cookie advising him to invest more time in drone videography.

title: Simiyu, Tanzania
description: He played college football in high school. But here, he’s actually working on his fourth PhD and decided he was in need of a well-deserved study break.
headline: headline

fb.title: The Most Interesting Man in Simiyu, Tanzania
fb.copy: He played college football in high school. But here, he’s actually working on his fourth PhD and decided he was in need of a well-deserved study break.

tw.copy: He played college football in high school.

title: Waitomo Caves, New Zealand
description: The recent rise in recreational spelunking is likely due to his fondness of the sport and the rumor that each time he embarks on a caving adventure, he leaves behind a pair of rare cufflinks in whichever rare cave he explores.
headline: headline

fb.title: title
